data.message:
Bump docker/build-push-action from 5 to 6 (#60)

Bumps [docker/build-push-action](https://github.com/docker/build-push-action) from 5 to 6.
- [Release notes](https://github.com/docker/build-push-action/releases)
- [Commits](https://github.com/docker/build-push-action/compare/v5...v6)

---
updated-dependencies:
- dependency-name: docker/build-push-action
  dependency-version: '6'
  dependency-type: direct:production
  update-type: version-update:semver-major
...

data.message:
Support ROS 2 Jazzy (#20)

* Replace the build/run scripts with a compose workflow

* Tweak docker ignore

* Update README instructions

* Matrix build

* Copy in the ros2_control_node as is

* Move clock waiting to the control loop itself to avoid blocking

* Ignore the ros2_control_node in pre-commit

* Cleanup CI

* try scoped locks

* Remove deprecated ament stuff

* Fix build for noble

* No more remapping

* Make control i/o lock free by doubling up buffers

* To jazzy and beyond

* Update README

* Additional build deps and build with dbg symbols

* Add comment with link to upstream PR

* Replace manual installs with ros deps

* Add TODO for the converter tool

* Add README note about the upstream

* Give up on graphics support and leave it to the people

data.message:
Initial support for Lidar sensors (#6)

* Updating test resources

* Initial setup of LiDAR sensors

* Parsing lidar data from config

* Publish lidar messages

* Update lidar example and get publish rates

* Minor cleanup

* Update rviz config

* Move the rangefinder

* Update documentation

* Only copy sensordata rather than all data

* Add a comment

* Transforms on the range

* Update test rviz config

* Add lidar conversion support and update the example robot

* Update src/mujoco_system_interface.cpp

Co-authored-by: Nathan Dunkelberger <138718889+ndunkelb-nasa@users.noreply.github.com>

* Name the image

* Add .gitignore

* Add rviz to the test deps

* Use a lidar tag and do all the frame conversion in the script

* Pull min and max angle from ros2 control xacro, don't assume min_angle is always 0

* Turn off rangefinder rendering in cameras

* Apply suggestions from code review

* Pre-commit fixes

* Add a node about lidar scan time

* Update class comment

* Set a default ROS_DOMAIN_ID just in case

---------
